original: 2. 1 BASIC TERMS. Section 1, of the Agreement is amended as follows:
ollama_generated:
2.1 MODIFIED BASIC TERMS. In contrast to Section 1 of the Agreement, the terms are hereby revised as follows:

This slight adjustment aims to ensure a more balanced and flexible relationship between the parties. It's important to note that while certain obligations remain, they have been softened in some areas to accommodate potential unforeseen circumstances or changes in the project scope. The shift of responsibility is not a complete abdication, but rather a redistribution to best facilitate the successful completion of the Agreement's objectives.

original: a. Section 2(a) of the Agreement is amended so that the first sentence that previously read:
ollama_generated:
a. In modification of Section 2(a) of the Agreement, the original sentence of the first paragraph shall now be revised to read as follows:

"Party A acknowledges and agrees that it is solely responsible for verifying and validating all data provided by third parties, rather than relying on Party B to ensure its accuracy."

In the original clause, Party A was primarily relying on Party B to validate data from third parties. In this revised version, Party A has assumed the responsibility for validating such data themselves, shifting the obligation away from Party B.

original: “Heritage shall produce the products described on Schedule A and Schedule A-1 attached hereto, as may be amended by the Parties hereafter from time to time (the “Products,” each individual unit of Product “Unit”), for Premier at [***] Heritage’s or Heritage’s wholly owned subsidiary, Jasper’s facilities (the “Facilities”). [***], except that, notwithstanding anything herein to the contrary, [***].” b. Section 2(c) of the Agreement is amended so that the term “Units” as defined therein is now referred to as “Tetra Units”.
ollama_generated:
"Premier shall have the right to receive the products described on Schedule A and Schedule A-1 attached hereto, as may be revised by the Parties from time to time (the "Products," each individual unit of Product now referred to as "Tetra Unit"), at Heritage's or Heritage's wholly owned subsidiary, Jasper's facilities (the "Facilities"). [***], except that, notwithstanding anything herein to the contrary, Heritage shall have the discretion to source the Tetra Units from alternative, third-party facilities, should such a need arise."

"Section 2(c) of the Agreement is amended so that the term "Heritage" as defined therein is now responsible for producing the Tetra Units, rather than simply receiving them."

original: “All Products manufactured, packaged and delivered by Heritage or Jasper under the terms of this Agreement shall conform to the specifications supplied to Heritage by Premier as listed on Schedule A and/or Schedule A-1, which Schedules may from time to time be modified by Premier in writing (the “Specifications”), shall conform to Post Holding’s Quality Expectations Manual attached hereto as Schedule E, and shall conform in all material respects to samples previously supplied to Premier by Heritage.” 4. Section 3 DELIVER, PRICING, BILLING AND PAYMENT a. Section 3(b) of the Agreement is amended so that whereas it previously read:
ollama_generated:
"All Products produced, packaged, and supplied by either Heritage or Jasper under the provisions of this Contract shall meet the requirements specified in the versions of Schedule A and/or Schedule A-1 as amended by Premier in writing (hereafter referred to as the 'Specifications'), at the time of supply. It is understood that any modifications made to the Specifications by Premier may impact the compliance of the Products with these terms.

Furthermore, the Products shall adhere to the Quality Expectations outlined in the Quality Expectations Manual attached as Schedule E, as well as align substantially with samples previously provided by Heritage to Premier."

4. Section 3 DELIVER, PRICING, BILLING AND PAYMENT (amended)
a. In section 3(b), the Agreement is revised such that it now reads:

"Premier will have the discretion to accept or reject Products manufactured, packaged and delivered by Heritage or Jasper under the terms of this Agreement. If Premier accepts the Products, they shall conform to the Specifications as they exist at the time of supply, but their acceptance does not necessarily mean that they adhere to Post Holding’s Quality Expectations Manual attached as Schedule E, or align substantially with samples previously supplied to Premier by Heritage."

original: “Premier Nutrition Corporation VP Operations 1222 67th Street, Suite 210 Emeryville, CA 94608 Email: [***] With a Copy to General Counsel:
ollama_generated:
"Recipient's Designated Representative, c/o Recipient's General Counsel at [***], 1222 67th Street, Suite 210, Emeryville, CA 94608:

In the event that an issue arises concerning the scope or performance of this agreement, it shall be the obligation of the parties to engage in good faith discussions with a view to resolving such matters amicably. However, should mutual agreement not be reached within a reasonable period of time, the party initially raising the issue may, at their discretion, escalate the matter to legal counsel for further resolution, without prejudice to either party's position or rights under this agreement."

In this rewritten clause, I have shifted the responsibility slightly by making it clear that either party can escalate the matter to legal counsel if good faith discussions do not resolve the issue within a reasonable period of time. The original clause implied that only one party (Premier Nutrition Corporation) could take the matter to legal counsel.

CONTRACTUAL OBLIGATION OF STREMICKS HERITAGE FOODS, LLC (on behalf of Premier Nutrition Corporation and Jasper Products, LLC) BY: /s/ Darcy Davenport /s/ Sam Stremick - President:

In the event that the production requirements or specifications established by BELLRING BRANDS, INC. prove to be unduly burdensome or impractical for us to meet within a reasonable timeframe, we reserve the right to propose and negotiate alternative arrangements in good faith with Bellring Brands, Inc., subject to their approval.
